extendedInfo.description: Miracle City is a fantastic city building game. By growing crops, building houses, and mining, you gain money and energy to develop your city. Decorations will please your citizens and so to make them work harder and more efficiently. Visiting and helping your friends often so that you may receive gifts and help from them which will accelerate the development of your city. Join us now in the Miracle City, and make your city the most fanciful oneï¼Highlighted features:* A huge variety of adorable buildings and decorations makes up a gorgeous city view in an easy arrangement.* Crops in Miracle City are imperishable, so you can drop in and harvest them at any time you like. * Complete goals to win extra rewards.* Unique "Happiness" concept - Place more decorations when you build more shops, so your citizens will be happy and pay more tax.* Help friends and send them gifts will bring you gifts in return, and you can increase their values by boosting your gifts before open them.* Redesign as you like without any delay in harvest.Buildings: Orchard, Butcher shop, Tailor shop, Bakery, Hunting cabin, Bar, Post office, Sawmill, Hat shop, Toy house, Mining camp, Jewelry shop, Candy house, Dairy farm, Wine cellar, Blacksmith shop, Windmill, Barber shop,CafÃ©, Pancake house, Gift shop, Magic house, Theater, Bank, Laboratory, Haunted house, Stable, Seafood bar, Fish market, Church, Observatory, Barracks, Castle, Purple cottage, Green cottage, Red cottage, Orange cottage, Quarry, Devil's callDecorations: Ash tree, Plane tree, Bird fountain, Ground tile, Road, Azalea, Jasmine, Cherry tree, Coconut tree, Haystack, Sumac, Magnolia, Violet, Pond, Pumpkin lamp, Street lamp, Camellia, Lilac, Rose, Lily, Park bench, Magic crystal, Unicorn statue, Black pearl, Mermaid statue, Dome gazebo, Carousel, Rainbow statue, Stone temple, Circus, Carnival, Bell tower, Well, Hero statue, Park bench, Chocolate fountain, Muddy road, River, Altar, WaterwheelMiracles:Magic array, Miracle scepter, Aurora tower, Wonder throneMore events are coming soon! Please contact us if you have any suggestion. Enjoy building your own Miracle City with your friends right away!==========================Droidhen is the name behind Defender, Defender II, Dinosaur War, Miracle City, Basketball Shot, DH Texas Poker, Gun of Glory, Shoot the Apple and many other top popular games. Droidhen is also marked as top developer by google.==========================

reviews.title: No Support
reviews.comment: The game force closes if you tap any icon on the right side of the screen, if you try to upgrade any building, or try to pull up any resource menu. I have attempted to contact support for the last couple couple months. I\'ve heard nothing. Most goals are unobtainable.  No stone, metal, or lumber. No storage. No gifts. No fun! Losing patience.  I had finally obtained the North halfway through the game at level 40.
reviews.author: Heather Miller

reviews.title: Shalimar
reviews.comment: Great game. Need more then 80 lvl. Really addictive . been playing a long time still love it but there has not been an up date since valentine\'s. Come on ppl give us a new update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: YEA BOY COOL BUT UPDATE BETTER OUTFIT
reviews.comment: Reply whoever made / I played a lot of games but this is the best out of all . Make another but better
reviews.author: Regina Singleton

reviews.comment: I love this game so much.   I\'ve been playing it for like 3 months + now and i never get tired of playing it!

reviews.title: Harassing
reviews.comment: How do I block someone? I have this person, that I do not know,  harassing me and sending messages about me to other people I don\'t even know.
reviews.author: Shelly Houle

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: I do rather enjoy the game itself. I\'m experiencing a lot of issues with connecting lately, though, both on 4g and wifi. This remains the only affected app, so I\'m certain it\'s not device-related. Have updated, uninstalled/reinstalled, etc. to no avail.
reviews.author: Keith Brawley

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Playing this game long time. Addicted. Need some new updates and cool stuff. Really a good mind relaxing game
reviews.author: shyam kumar

reviews.comment: Good game
reviews.author: mathew lundy

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: Best game I have, Its lasting longer then any other game I have downloaded:-) Love it wish you guys would come out with a miracle city 2 that would be sweet!!!
reviews.author: Angela Klande

reviews.title: Will not run on jelly bean
reviews.comment: I loved this game on android ice cream sandwich. But when I updated to jelly bean it began crashing at almost any action. Uninstalled and re installed but it still happens. Needs serious updating or it is an obsolite game.
reviews.author: A Khan

reviews.title: It fun but
reviews.comment: It is fun but there ton of bug. I could not open the gift. Moreover I couldn\'t do other things otherwise it will crash
reviews.author: A Lop Mok

reviews.title: A few ideas for improvement.
reviews.comment: Love love love this game so THANKS to the developers. Very addicting. A few ideas to make playing even more fun.... #1. It would be great if an icon could be added to each of your friends in the friends menu to let you know that they are or are not ready to be held again. Instead of having to go throughout the entire list only to find a few ready to be helped. I know that once the collect the tax your notified but if you help multiple friends at once it\'s impossible to remember each one to help them again.
reviews.author: Athena Chavez

reviews.title: cool Games
reviews.comment: nice Games very Cool
reviews.author: Hatijah Lyn

reviews.title: Doesn\'t pay crystals from mini missions.
reviews.comment: I have had this game for over month and it won\'t pay crystals when i complete a mission and hasn\'t gone past 18 crystals in 3 days, i now should have had26 by now. WHY???? love it otherwise but no sense if can\'t gain andWON\'T AND NOT ALLOWED TO SPEND MONEY ON IT! FIX PLEASE!
reviews.author: Julz Stoddart

reviews.comment: New items Plz!!! Valentine\'s decorations need to go.  Never got Easter decorations no new building\'s or n e thing Plz update the game!\tIt would b nice if new decorations n shops r available especially for those who have missed some from past levels as well!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fixed..
reviews.comment: Thanks connection issue fixed. Great game, good fun. High quality art and design. Built in social messenger and for free. Highly recommended if u have the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Change a buttun or two
reviews.comment: Ive wasted 3 jewels on a 5min  house on accident. I never am able to save up to get something good. If the speed up button can be changed or atleast have an \"are you sure you want to do this\" button that would be nice but overall I like this game its addicting!
reviews.author: alex lee

reviews.title: Update please.
reviews.comment: Update please the Valentine day is so old. The game now is feels me boring. So please update update update update .........
reviews.author: Kharlo Benigay

reviews.title: Want to Start Over
reviews.comment: This game is great! It just needs a way to start over from scratch. I\'m a perfectionist and I don\'t like the way my city is turning out. Please add a start over option in the settings for players with OCD tendencies! It doesn\'t work to uninstall and reinstall. Also for people who have already  finished all quests it gives them a chance to start over and try to build a better city. :)
reviews.author: Anna Caulpetzer

reviews.title: What\'s up
reviews.comment: I love this game but I can\'t get the coins when I help my other players it show I\'m getting it cause I push ok but the coins don\'t go in my account.and now I can\'t up gread my stuff.but love it.hope they fix that cause that\'s where u can make money .
reviews.author: Michelle Aguero
